title: put on a leaver buster low priority wait
body: my game crashed when i came back into the game my team voted for early surrender but i got this crash report why have i been put on a low priority for five games please riot fix this.

replies.body: The low priority queue was added if you were out of the match long enough to be marked as afk. They aren't applied after just one afk, so you should be able to troubleshoot with the steps in [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to see if those crashes are happening from damaged or missing game files, or some kind of bad driver interaction possibly.
